body:
GitHub won't let me tag the right line, but could you also call this: https://github.com/colesbury/pytorch/blob/1a21d910e18a0104fc1f399add8f07b86d7cfdfe/aten/src/THC/THCTensorRandom.cu#L82-L88 on the result of `curand_uniform`?

Because the RNG returns (0, 1] I'm worried that we're skewing the probability distribution by just selecting the last non-zero element everytime a 1 is generated.
body_html:

Because the RNG returns (0, 1] I'm worried that we're skewing the probability distribution by just selecting the last non-zero element everytime a 1 is generated.
body_text:
GitHub won't let me tag the right line, but could you also call this: https://github.com/colesbury/pytorch/blob/1a21d910e18a0104fc1f399add8f07b86d7cfdfe/aten/src/THC/THCTensorRandom.cu#L82-L88 on the result of curand_uniform?
Because the RNG returns (0, 1] I'm worried that we're skewing the probability distribution by just selecting the last non-zero element everytime a 1 is generated.
